ygData.subject: New Song?
ygData.msgSnippet: Name:     Song of Solidarity Function: Whenever a member of the party takes damage, that damage it distributed among the party members. For example, a 5 person
ygData.messageBody:
Name: Song of Solidarity
Function: Whenever a member of the party takes damage, that damage it
distributed among the party members.

For example, a 5 person party:

The warrior gets hit for 75 (make this simple *Smiles*) points of
damage. The warrior actually gets hit for 15 points, and all other
party members get hit for 15 points of non-melee damage.

Very hard to code (probably a lot of logic changes,) but something
different which would augment the Bard's ability to lessen party
downtime. (Maybe.)

Gaelthorne
Xegony
